body:
Hey guys,
I just uploaded a video regarding whether you would like to see Drive Club.
So do you want to see Drive Club on PS4?
Anyway here is the video - it will explain the rest.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mAQwOJBmMw
Any tips? Tell me below!
Thanks, Endertait.

title: Would you like to watch Drive Club?

replies.body:
I haven't seen the game before, but it looks interesting.

Oh also, you should probably move this into the "gaming" category since "media" is for Avicus content only.

ill take that as a yes for wanting to see it. I nearly put it in gaming.
